title: AMD Rx480 Antialising issue.
body: In game antialising suck with my amd card, i tried to turn on msaa x2x4x8 and morfological filtering but it doesnt  work, i still look champs ans minion very bad. Is there a way that i can put a type of antialising?

replies.body: Definitely make sure your drivers are up to date before anything else, so it can render the game properly.  You can check our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to double check that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and our tech team can work with you directly in case it's still an issue.  I hope that helps!
